name: Dropdown Actions - Navigate to Frame v1
description:
Community discussion is here.


Trying to figure out how to prototype a dropdown with items that navigate to different frames. Please copy to your drafts and see if you can figure it out (note: it's not quite working here because the second time you select a dropdown menu item, the dropdown menu stays open, breaking the expected behavior).


Thanks to @Design_Xstream for the base prototype this was built on top of. Also see his interactive dropdown.
